import React, {Component} from 'react'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Modal from './Modal'; import {resetConfirmModal} from './ModalData'; //import Button from './MyButton'; //import TextArea from'./TextArea'; /*const interfaceDivStyle = { marginLeft:'20px', marginRight:'60px' }*/ class Menu extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { fileName: '', }; this.confirmReset = this.confirmReset.bind(this); this.set_analyst_name = this.set_analyst_name.bind(this); this.set_analyst_email = this.set_analyst_email.bind(this); this.filemanger = this.filemanger.bind(this); this.loadSADFace = this.loadSADFace.bind(this); this.handleFileName = this. handleFileName.bind(this); } confirmReset(){ console.log("reset"); //$('#confirm_reset_modal').modal('show');" } set_analyst_name(){ console.log('set name'); } set_analyst_email(){ console.log('set email'); } filemanger(){ console.log('file manager'); } loadSADFace(){ // "document.getElementByID('loadJSON').click();" console.log('loadSADFace'); } handleFileName(event){ this.setState({fileName: event.target.value}, () => console.log(this.state.fileName, 'filename')) } render() { return ( /*Slidein Panel: START*/
